ai-patthana8.70:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.70:1.1_0: Not seeing the three conditions for the arising of thought. ...
ai-patthana8.70:2.1_0: the principle not to cultivate the principle that gives rise to diversity of people ...
ai-patthana8.70:3.1_0: the principle not to cultivate the principle of ascetics and brahmins ...
ai-patthana8.70:4.1_0: for the sake of cause, based on the five reasons you’re not rid of greed, five, ten, twenty, thirty, or forty.
